name: car code
description: This is a simple API that will return the human readable version of DTC codes (OBD-II Trouble Codes).

api_methods.name: /obd2/{code}
api_methods.description: This endpoint will provide the human readable version of a requested obd2 code

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what the DTC code P0300 means for my car?
I need to understand the issue with my vehicle’s DTC code P0171.
What does the OBD-II code P0420 indicate about my car’s performance?
Could you explain the meaning of the trouble code P0128 for my Honda Accord?
My car’s dashboard is showing the DTC code P0442. Can you decode it for me?
I’m trying to figure out what the OBD-II code P0700 means for my Toyota Camry.
Please provide the human-readable description for the DTC code P0135.
What’s the issue with my car if it’s showing the DTC code P0507?
Can you decode the OBD-II trouble code P0455 for my Ford F-150?
I need to know what the DTC code P0304 signifies for my vehicle.
